thread.title: Shira Adams
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Shira Adams

author: Shira Adams
title: Shira Adams
text: I have had a really good experience with purchasing wigs from this company. My first memorable experience when I made my first purchase of 2 wigs for my sister with cancer. I was excited for her to receive them and send me pictures of her in the wigs. But it never happened she passed away before I could see her with them on. Even tho is was a sad moment I hold it near and dear to my heart.
